TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DatabaseNotEnabledForNotificationException extends System.SystemException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a SQL Server database is not enabled to support dependencies associated with the class. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example is an exception handler for a simple administration page for setting up change notification in a SQL Server database.
For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin> class overview topic.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx.vb#8)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Caching.DatabaseNotEnabledForNotificationException.%23ctor%2A> creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.DatabaseNotEnabledForNotificationException> class with all fields set to their default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that describes the error.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
